config.maidsoulkitchen.task.melon_stem_l:
These entries configure the melon stem list
rule: §eattached_melon_stem_block_id
Eg: §eminecraft:attached_pumpkin_stem §eminecraft:attached_pumpkin_stem ...
config.maidsoulkitchen.task.melon_and_st:
These entries configure the melon stem and melon_block list
rule: §emelon_item_id(silk touch)§c,§eattached_melon_stem_block_id
Eg: §eminecraft:melon§c,§eminecraft:attached_melon_stem

overlay.maidsoulkitchen.book.tips:
The book will change the working mode to the retrieval start height value of the maid of the fruit
Right-click +1, stealth right-click -1
The search range is 2 blocks up from the starting height
message.maidsoulkitchen.book.max_yoffset: The value of YOffset must be within the range of -5 to 5

gui.maidsoulkitchen.patchouli_warning.ti: You'll need to install the Patchouli mod to open book entry feature
tooltips.maidsoulkitchen.amount.title: Craft One Amount Ingredient:
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.entrie:
Maid can cook by using mod blocks.
 You just need to put recipe ingredient on the maid inventory.

This is the settings screen for the maid's cooking task, and you can click on the sidebar to jump to this screen firstn
- 1.This is a display of the current maid's cooking tasksn
- 2.Toggle cooking modes: Random and Directional (Random) moden
  - Random Mode: Completely random, randomly select the matching recipe from all the recipes for cookingn
  - Directional (Random) Mode: Randomly select matching recipes from selected recipes for cookingn
- 3.Select the food you want to cookn
- 4.You can click the up and down buttons to switch between the upper and lower page recipes, or the mouse wheel can also be used
Maid can harvest fruits, you can use book right click to maid change harvest search height.
patchouli.touhou_little_maid.book.catego: A addon that make maid lear more skill about farm and cook.
